column4: i got a problem tho, when i first run ubuntu install, it detected the card (ra0) and then after setting up all the wireles things its froze, no it wont detect it again
i always get quezzy when its asking me to format partitions :(
is there a command line msn / im software ? and is it available on apt-get?
